title: Stremio Vulnerability Exposes Millions to Attack
description:
CyFox researchers have discovered a DLL planting/hijacking vulnerability in popular media center application Stremio. Learn more here.

The post Stremio Vulnerability Exposes Millions to Attack appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Arch Linux 2023.08.01 Brings Linux Kernel 6.4, Archinstall 2.6
description:
Arch Linux 2023.08.01 ships with the latest Linux 6.4 kernel series, with new and updated features for top-notch hardware support.

The post Arch Linux 2023.08.01 Brings Linux Kernel 6.4, Archinstall 2.6 appeared first on Linux Today.
